----- Original Message -----
From: PsyKo
To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, October 12, 2002 11:41 PM
Subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] A dilema


To be the ignorant one for once, what is "nerfing".
By this I assume you mean some sort of changes in the
character in some way... do they have any sites with
info on said "nerf'"? If it is a good "nerf'" I might
just consider keeping him... Oh, he just dinged 9
tonight and I got the stats mixed up, at the moment he
has 164 AC and 244 ATK with. Thanks for the heads
up.. Peace out, PsyKo


--- nomad <sasank@...> wrote:
> welll
> there about to do some nerfing on monks
> might want to check on that and see if effects your
> decision
>
> nomad
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: PsyKo
> To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Saturday, October 12, 2002 3:26 PM
> Subject: [The EverQuest Tavern] A dilema
>
>
> Ok, I am trying to decide which character to get
> settled into. I have a lvl 8 Monk with 209
> NATURAL AC
> and a h2h attack of 152. I also have a Mage I am
> working on it is also lvl 8. With the mage, I can
> help people in the future, by supplying newbies
> with
> phantom plate armor, but with the monk, I have
> carefully raised him with very high skill points,
> and
> am able to take on lvl 10-12 equiv mobs. The
> thought
> of taking on dragons is very appealing.
> Any help in deciding which one to go further
> with
> would be much appreciated. Catch y'all online,
> Marshun AKA Dragonkahn AKA Ustachlak ect... ect...
> ect..
